meanings.sent1: She worked hard to strengthen her glutes through exercise.
meanings.sent2: Running uphill engages the glutes more than running on flat ground.
meanings.sent3: The glutes were not happy after sitting for hours on the uncomfortable chair.
meanings.sent4: Her glutes felt like two rocks after the intense workout.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's glutes were as firm as steel, supporting her graceful movements.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or involving the muscles in the buttocks.
meanings.sent1: His glutes workout routine focused on building strength and flexibility.
meanings.sent2: Wearing high heels can lead to glutes pain due to the altered posture.
meanings.sent3: The glutes-friendly chair was designed to promote better posture.
meanings.sent4: She felt a surge of glutes power as she climbed the steep hill.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's glutes strength was evident in the powerful kick during the game.
